channel.title: Behavior Analytics service for Product Management
channel.description:
We want to get user feedback on our software and find out how they use it, what works and what doesn't.
To help out with that we are debating using a "behavior analytics" service like [HotJar](https://www.hotjar.com) or [VWO](https://vwo.com/)?
Has anyone used this type of service before? What was your experience?

item.title: Behavior Analytics service for Product Management
